tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecom_security_policies (
	policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	policy_description TEXT,
	created_by VARCHAR(100),
	created_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE security_guidelines (
  guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  guideline_description TEXT,
  policy_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES security_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE guidelines (
    guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guideline_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    guideline_desc TEXT,
    policy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES security_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE best_practices (
    practice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    practice_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    practice_desc TEXT,
    guideline_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (guideline_id) REFERENCES guidelines(guideline_id)
);

CREATE TABLE teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    team_leader VARCHAR(100),
    practice_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (practice_id) REFERENCES best_practices(practice_id)
);
